= Development =

A tree for 1.5 development should be available sometime very soon (August 2009).  If you are working on development, please publish your work and cc the mailing list as much as possible.

 * Binary protocol development
  * http://github.com/dustin/memcached/tree/master
   * Includes corrected authorship/attribution history
  * http://github.com/dustin/memcached-test
   * Client and server test code (used primarily for binary protocol testing)

 * Plugin storage engine development
  * http://github.com/trondn/memcached/tree/engine

= Archive =

 * The community's moved to git distributed sccs for its development needs, but the original subversion repository is still available.
  * http://code.sixapart.com/svn/memcached/
